video_caption: The video begins with a white circular logo featuring a black microphone and green lines, set against a white background. The logo rotates and zooms in, revealing a coffee cup beneath the microphone. The text "your capital market & equity funding news source" appears below the logo. The scene transitions to a woman with blonde hair, wearing a black shirt, sitting in front of a black background with a microphone and coffee cup logo. The text "your capital market & equity funding news source" is displayed below her. The video then shifts to a man in a suit, sitting in front of a microphone with a logo that reads "CMI Official Member 2024" and "Sustainable Minerals." The background features a hexagonal pattern, and the logo with the microphone and coffee cup is visible in the bottom right corner. The video maintains a professional and informative atmosphere throughout, focusing on the individuals and their respective backgrounds.

The video features a woman with blonde hair, dressed in a black top, seated in front of a microphone, engaging in a conversation. The backdrop includes a graphic of a microphone and text that reads "invest-ken secret" and "the investing investor." The scene transitions to a man wearing a dark blazer and a patterned shirt, seated in front of a microphone with a logo that reads "CMI Official Member 2024" and "Sustainable Minerals." The text overlay identifies him as "Tom Drivas - CEO and Director, Appia Rare Earths & Uranium Corp." The video maintains a professional atmosphere, with both individuals appearing to be part of a formal interview or discussion, likely related to investment or business topics. The consistent use of microphones and the presence of logos and text suggest a focus on corporate or industry-related content.

The video features Tom Drivas, the CEO and Director of Appia Rare Earths & Uranium Corp., seated in front of a microphone, engaged in a conversation. He is dressed in a dark blazer over a patterned shirt, and the setting includes a backdrop with a logo that reads "CMI Official Member 2024" and the words "Sustainable Minerals." The text overlay at the top of the screen provides the company's stock exchange information: "Appia Rare Earths & Uranium Corp. - CSE: API | OTCQX: APAAF." Throughout the video, Tom Drivas is seen gesturing with his hands, indicating an active discussion. The background remains consistent, with the microphone and logo clearly visible, and the atmosphere appears professional and focused on the topic at hand.
